entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
